name: Super Mutant Horse
description:
If you experience lag, please try the downloadable JAR file.

The Stable is the only life you knew… until you decided to escape.

Play as Harold, a super mutant horse with web-slinging abilities. Try to escape a dark government lab known as “The Stable”. Use your special abilities to neutralize threats and clear rooms.

Can you UN-Stable yourself from The Stable?
